creator: Xeropan International Kft.
descriptionHtml:
Join 710,000+ Xeropan players from over 160 countries! Enjoy learning through play everyday to see HUGE improvements in your English.
Xeropan has 3+ YEARS of English learning content.
Improve all your language skills at every level.

Learn English from anywhere. Continue your English learning progress playing on mobile or web.

Welcome to Xeropan, the English learning app from the future. 🌠

The year is 2157. 🤖 From outer space, a comet hits the Earth’s surface. ☄️ Suddenly, no one can communicate. 🤐
Without communication, the entire world — our future — is in total chaos. 🆘
Professor Max, an English teacher of the future, builds a time machine. 🚀 He travels back in time to save the world. 🌍 Complete English lessons to earn stars for his time machine. ⭐️ Together you can fight chaos and save the world! ⏳💫
Let’s have a little fun learning English, shall we?

FEATURES included in the Xeropan English learning app:
⭐️ Learn real-life English expressions from pop culture videos 🇺🇸🇬🇧
⭐️ Make learning fun, interesting, and interactive
⭐️ Translated into 15+ languages for your understanding
⭐️ Improve your English pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary
⭐️ Track and review your daily progress
⭐️ Perfect for ALL LEVELS beginner through expert
⭐️ Practice your English speaking skills with an intelligent bot
⭐️ Compete with your friends and level up
🚫No boring lessons allowed🚫
Built by trusted ESL teachers with years of experience and a sense of humor🤓📚🤪

🌍 HUGE KNOWLEDGE BASE with over 3+ years of reading, writing, listening, and speaking content
🏝 EXPLORE TOPICS on the islands with lessons such as Health, Work, Money, Relationships, etc.
❓GET FEEDBACK when you make mistakes to understand English better
👁 VOCABULARY BUILDER with 8000+ English expressions to review from your lessons
📖 GRAMMAR GUIDE gives you a foundation so you can construct sentences and communicate correctly
🎁 NEW WEEKLY LESSONS on dozens of everyday topics
Great for beginners!

Now you can learn English at lightning speed ⚡️⚡️⚡️

Join 1,000,000+ Xeropan players from over 160 countries! Enjoy learning through play everyday to see HUGE improvements in your English.
Xeropan has 3+ YEARS of English learning content.
Improve all your language skills at every level.

Learn English from anywhere. Continue your English learning progress playing on mobile or web.

Welcome to Xeropan, the English learning app from the future. 🌠

The year is 2157. 🤖 From outer space, a comet hits the Earth’s surface. ☄️ Suddenly, no one can communicate. 🤐
Without communication, the entire world — our future — is in total chaos. 🆘
Professor Max, an English teacher of the future, builds a time machine. 🚀 He travels back in time to save the world. 🌍 Complete English lessons to earn stars for his time machine. ⭐️ Together you can fight chaos and save the world! ⏳💫
Let’s have a little fun learning English, shall we?

FEATURES included in the Xeropan English learning app:
⭐️ Learn real-life English expressions from pop culture videos 🇺🇸🇬🇧
⭐️ Make learning fun, interesting, and interactive
⭐️ Translated into 15+ languages for your understanding
⭐️ Improve your English pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary
⭐️ Track and review your daily progress
⭐️ Perfect for ALL LEVELS beginner through expert
⭐️ Practice your English speaking skills with an intelligent bot
⭐️ Compete with your friends and level up
🚫 No boring lessons allowed 🚫
Built by trusted ESL teachers with years of experience and a sense of humor 🤓📚🤪

🌍 HUGE KNOWLEDGE BASE with over 3+ years of reading, writing, listening, and speaking content
🏝 EXPLORE TOPICS on the islands with lessons such as Health, Work, Money, Relationships, etc.
❓ GET FEEDBACK when you make mistakes to understand English better
👁 VOCABULARY BUILDER with 8000+ English expressions to review from your lessons
📖 GRAMMAR GUIDE gives you a foundation so you can construct sentences and communicate correctly
🎁 NEW WEEKLY LESSONS on dozens of everyday topics
Great for beginners!

Now you can learn English at lightning speed ⚡️⚡️⚡️

Without communication, the entire world—our future—is in total chaos.
Professor Max, a language teacher from the future, builds a time machine. He travels back in time to save the world. Complete English, Spanish, French and German lessons to earn stars for his time machine. Together you can fight chaos and save the world!

Let’s have a little fun learning a new language, shall we?



FEATURES included in the Xeropan language learning app:

- Learn real-life expressions from pop culture videos

- Make learning fun, interesting, and interactive

- Translated into 17+ languages for your understanding

- Improve your pronunciation, grammar and vocabulary

- Track and review your daily progress

- Perfect for ALL LEVELS, beginner through expert

- Practice your speaking skills with an intelligent bot

- Compete with your friends and level up

- No boring lessons allowed

Built by trusted ESL teachers with years of experience and a sense of humor



- HUGE KNOWLEDGE BASE with over 5+ years of reading, writing, listening and speaking content

- EXPLORE TOPICS on the islands with lessons such as Health, Work, Money, Relationships, etc.

- GET FEEDBACK when you make mistakes to understand English better

- VOCABULARY BUILDER with 8000+ expressions to review from your lessons

- GRAMMAR GUIDE gives you a foundation so you can construct sentences and communicate correctly

- NEW WEEKLY LESSONS on dozens of everyday topics Great for beginners!



Now you can learn English, Spanish, French and German at lightning speed!

Join 1,500,000+ Xeropan players from over 160 countries! Enjoy learning through play every day to see HUGE improvements in your foreign language learning.


Xeropan has 5+ YEARS of language learning content. Improve all your language skills at every level.



Learn a new language from anywhere. Continue your English, Spanish, French or German learning experience on mobile or web.



Welcome to Xeropan, the language learning app from the future.

The year is 2157. From outer space, a comet hits the Earth’s surface. Suddenly, no one can communicate.

Without communication, the entire world—our future—is in total chaos.
Professor Max, a language teacher from the future, builds a time machine. He travels back in time to save the world. Complete English, Spanish, French and German lessons to earn stars for his time machine. Together you can fight chaos and save the world!

Let’s have a little fun learning a new language, shall we?



FEATURES included in the Xeropan language learning app:

- Learn real-life expressions from pop culture videos

- Make learning fun, interesting, and interactive

- Translated into 17+ languages for your understanding

- Improve your pronunciation, grammar and vocabulary

- Track and review your daily progress

- Perfect for ALL LEVELS, beginner through expert

- Practice your speaking skills with an intelligent bot

- Compete with your friends and level up

- No boring lessons allowed

Built by trusted ESL teachers with years of experience and a sense of humor



- HUGE KNOWLEDGE BASE with over 5+ years of reading, writing, listening and speaking content

- EXPLORE TOPICS on the islands with lessons such as Health, Work, Money, Relationships, etc.

- GET FEEDBACK when you make mistakes to understand English, Spanish, French and German better

- VOCABULARY BUILDER with 8000+ expressions to review from your lessons

- GRAMMAR GUIDE gives you a foundation so you can construct sentences and communicate correctly

- NEW WEEKLY LESSONS on dozens of everyday topics



Great for beginners!



Now you can learn English, Spanish, French and German at lightning speed!

- - - - - -

App translation in 17 languages and counting: 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇭🇺🇪🇸🇲🇽🇫🇷🇩🇪🇦🇹🇮🇹🇧🇷🇵🇹🇵🇱🇷🇴🇷🇺🇹🇷🇪🇬🇲🇦🇯🇵🇰🇷🇮🇳🇮🇩🇻🇳

Start learning: https://xeropan.com/register

Continue learning: https://xeropan.com/login

Download app: https://xeropan.com/download

Facebook: facebook.com/xeropanapp
descriptionShort: It's time to learn a new language on a time-travel adventure with Xeropan!

appDetails.developerName: Xeropan: Learn languages in a fun and easy way
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We made some minor corrections in the app to make it faster, better and simply nicer. This way you can focus only on developing your language skills, this is our most important goal.

title: Xeropan: Learn languages

creator: Xeropan: Learn languages in a fun and easy way
descriptionHtml:
Join 1,500,000+ Xeropan players from over 160 countries! Enjoy learning through play every day to see HUGE improvements in your foreign language learning.


Xeropan has 5+ YEARS of language learning content. Improve all your language skills at every level.



Learn a new language from anywhere. Continue your English, Spanish, French or German learning experience on mobile or web.



Welcome to Xeropan, the language learning app from the future.

The year is 2157. From outer space, a comet hits the Earth’s surface. Suddenly, no one can communicate.

Without communication, the entire world—our future—is in total chaos.
Professor Max, a language teacher from the future, builds a time machine. He travels back in time to save the world. Complete English, Spanish, French and German lessons to earn stars for his time machine. Together you can fight chaos and save the world!

Let’s have a little fun learning a new language, shall we?



FEATURES included in the Xeropan language learning app:

- Learn real-life expressions from pop culture videos

- Make learning fun, interesting, and interactive

- Translated into 17+ languages for your understanding

- Improve your pronunciation, grammar and vocabulary

- Track and review your daily progress

- Perfect for ALL LEVELS, beginner through expert

- Practice your speaking skills with an intelligent bot

- Compete with your friends and level up

- No boring lessons allowed

Built by trusted ESL teachers with years of experience and a sense of humor



- HUGE KNOWLEDGE BASE with over 5+ years of reading, writing, listening and speaking content

- EXPLORE TOPICS on the islands with lessons such as Health, Work, Money, Relationships, etc.

- GET FEEDBACK when you make mistakes to understand English, Spanish, French and German better

- VOCABULARY BUILDER with 8000+ expressions to review from your lessons

- GRAMMAR GUIDE gives you a foundation so you can construct sentences and communicate correctly

- NEW WEEKLY LESSONS on dozens of everyday topics



Great for beginners!



Now you can learn English, Spanish, French and German at lightning speed!

- - - - - -

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Get ready for a fresh take on language learning! Our new update brings a complete UI revamp to make your journey simpler and more enjoyable. Highlights:

🎉 Home screen now a step-by-step path,
🌟 Keep your progress, points, stars,
🌙 Dark mode for late-night studying,
📱 New tablet & iPad design,
🖼️ Weekly lessons now at CEFR level & bonus lessons with more stars to collect.

Happy learning!

Welcome to Xeropan, the language learning app from the future.

The year is 2157. 🤖 From outer space, a comet hits the Earth’s surface. ☄️ Suddenly, no one can communicate. 🤐

Without communication, the entire world—our future—is in total chaos. 🆘
Professor Max, a language teacher from the future, builds a time machine. He travels back in time to save the world. Complete English, Spanish, French and German lessons to earn stars for his time machine. Together you can fight chaos and save the world!
